title: NVIDIA Corp. stock falls Friday, underperforms market
text:
Shares of NVIDIA Corp. 
        NVDA,
        +0.12%
       dropped 0.20% to $547.10 Friday, on what proved to be an all-around mixed trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       rising 0.08% to 4,783.83 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 0.31% to 37,592.98. The stock's fall snapped a six-day winning streak. NVIDIA Corp. closed $6.36 short of its 52-week high ($553.46), which the company reached on January 11th. Trading volume (35.0 M) remained 7.2 million below its 50-day average volume of 42.2 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use. Something unusual happened in the stock market this quarter: Both the S&P 500 and Cboe Volatility Index, better known as the Vix, rose.
